name: 應用生物力學研究
description: Through the study of the general theory and its application in Newtonian mechanics to solve Biomechanical problems.
goals: Through the study of the general theory and its application in Newtonian mechanics to solve Biomechanical problems.
syllabus:
1.Motion in a plane and a general three dimension.  
  
2.A general vectorial development of the dynamics of a single particle and of systems of particles is given in discussion.  
  
3.The Kinematics and dynamics of rigid bodies with particular emphasis upon rotational motion in three dimensions .
